job.description: pstrongTITLE Data ScientistMachine Learning EngineerstrongppstrongLOCATION RemotestrongppstrongDuration 612 month to permstrongppbrppnbspppstrongMUST HAVESstrongpulli5 Python software development for composition and modularity debugging and following tracebacksliliStrong stats background and concepts including hypothesis testing correlation R squared PvalueliliExperience with Pandas NumPy SciPy PytorchliliTensorflow functional API deep learningliliMathematics of machine learning linear algebra multivariable calculusliliSQL queryingliliHyperparameter optimization regularizing regression modelsliulpbrppstrongPLUSSESstrongpulliMasters or PhD HIGHLY preferredliliEcommerce experienceliulpnbspppstrongDAY TO DAYstrongnbspnbspnbspnbspppA company is looking for a Data ScientistMachine Learning Engineer to sit remotely within the USnbspWe follow industry standard practices for managing collaboration deployment and testingnbspWe deploy and interact with resources on AWSnbspppResponsibilities includepp Analyze large data sets by quantifying the data quality identifying particular patterns and visualizing resultspp Understand business problems and identify the right data sets and MLStatistical approach to produce the desired outcomespp Adapt to account for changes and be able to propose alternative approachespp Ideate and develop analytics and modeling solutions crossfunctionally to build customized longterm and sustainable solutionspp Provide critical thought leadership and enhance organizational capabilitiespp Own machine learning pipelines endtoendpp Write productiongrade machine learning code using standard engineering practices and deploy models to productionpp Improve codebase and leadparticipate in code reviews with Research Scientists and Data Scientistspp Help nonengineers develop their engineering skillspulli Mentor junior team members and contribute to a culture where everyone is valuedliul
